item.title: Hugo setup
item.description: Introduction Github Pages, where this site is hosted, recommends Jekyll, but by the name alone it’s clear that Hugo is far superior. This is based on Rich Youngkin’s 2020-08-31 guide. My system macOS Big Sur 11.3.1 hugo v0.83.1+extended darwin/amd64 BuildDate=unknown Installation brew install hugo New site setup I use the Smol theme. # Make the site SITEDIR=./hugo hugo new site $SITEDIR # Install a theme THEMEZIP=https://github.com/colorchestra/smol/archive/refs/heads/master.zip THEMENAME=smol cd themes curl $THEMEZIP > $THEMENAME.
